comments.snippet:
workaround , not perfect, not integration:

External Tools:
```
Filename: %SystemRoot%\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe
Arguments: -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File C:\PATHTO\mremotemulti.ps1 -servername %hostname% -domain %domain% -username %username% -password %!Password%
```
mremotemulti.ps1
```
param([String[]] $servername, [String] $domain, [String] $username, [String] $password )
	
 cmdkey /generic:$servername /user:$domain\$username /pass:$password 
 mstsc /multimon ...
